name: shagreen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also shagreen leather) a type of leather that has a raised pattern and was orginally made from the skin of a fish: He used rare materials such as bronze, vellum and shagreen in his work. The desk is inlaid with oyster-coloured shagreen leather.
More examplesFewer examplesThere has been unprecedented demand for shagreen recently.The new collection of furniture has inlaid parchment, snake, lizard, shagreen, and horn.She took a cigarette out of a shagreen case.Real shagreen is a natural hide, and is typically made from the skin of shark, stingray or dogfish, although now man-made replicas are widely used.
